casebody.data:
Jacquelyn Faith GARRISON
v.
Shelby HOLT, Individually and as former Executor of the Estate of Lois Garrison and as Trustee for Jacquelyn Faith Garrison; Jimmie E. James, Individually and as Executor of the Estate of Lois Garrison. No. 491P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. Shelby J. Holt, Pro Se. David W. Silver, for Jacquelyn Garrison.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th day of October 2007 by Respondent (Shelby Holt) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th day of April 2008."
